channel.title: Setting on Tech
channel.description: Recent content in Setting on Tech

item.title: Mac Setting
item.description: Mac Setting # Safari # Empty Caches # Safari > Preferences Advanced Check Show Develop menu in menu bar Develop > Empty caches Proxy Settings # Switch On Safari > Preferences Advanced Change Settings... Select Proxies tab Check Web Proxy (HTTP) and enter proxy domain : proxy port Check Secure Web Proxy (HTTP) and enter proxy domain : proxy port Click OK Click Apply Restart Safari (It will take some time for the change to take effect)
